modules.name: Topograph
modules.description:
Topographic drum machine. This module is based on the original
Mutable Instruments (TM) Grids sequencer module. The Map and Density
controls explore and control the denisty of many pre-baked drum patterns.

modules.name: uGraph
modules.description:
Topographic drum machine. This module is based on the original
Mutable Instruments (TM) Grids sequencer module. The Map and Density
controls explore and control the denisty of many pre-baked drum patterns.

modules.name: Dexter
modules.description:
A multi-timbral, 4-operator FM oscillator with wavetable and
waveshaping capabilities.

modules.name: Plateau
modules.description: Lush and bendable plate reverb based on the Dattorro 1997 algorithm.

modules.name: Interzone
modules.description:
Polyphonic, virtual analogue synthesiser voice complete with
a VCO, mixer, filter, LFO, and envelope generator.

modules.name: Amalgam
modules.description:
Multi-mode stereo signal combiner. Amalgam lets you combine and
smash together signals in many different ways.

modules.name: Feline
modules.description: A stereo, state variable, virtual analogue filter.

modules.name: Terrorform
modules.description:
An extensive wavetable oscillator that lets you explore
and rip apart wavetables in many different ways.
